records.Message__c: I’m not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a medical professional for serious symptoms or emergencies.The COVID-19 self-assessment can guide you in seeking appropriate medical care. Do you agree?
records.Name: C19_Consent

records.Message__c: Ok, since you don't consent to this assessment the session will now be ended. Thank you!
records.Name: C19_No_Consent

records.Message__c: If you're experiencing a medical emergency, call 911 or your local emergency number.
records.Name: C19_Initial_Message

records.Message__c:
In the last 14 days, have you had contact with the following individuals?
- Someone diagnosed with COVID-19
- Someone who works in a public setting like a healthcare facility or a grocery store
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen6

records.Message__c: The COVID-19 self-assessment can guide you in seeking appropriate medical care. This risk assessment isn’t meant to take the place of consultation with your healthcare provider or to diagnose or treat conditions, including COVID-19.
records.Name: C19_Greeting_2

records.Message__c:
Do you have any of these additional symptoms?
- A fever or temperature greater than 100.4 F
- Moderate to severe breathing problems
- Abnormally tired or fatigued
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen3

records.Message__c:
Emergency: Call 911. You may be having a medical emergency. Call 911 now. You need immediate medical attention.
Tell the 911 operator if you’ve been in contact with someone with COVID-19 or if you’ve been to a place where COVID-19 is spreading.
records.Name: C19_Call_911

records.Message__c: To book an appointment with our COVID-19 care team, click here
records.Name: C19_Symptomatic_2

records.Message__c:
- Lived in or visited a place where COVID-19 is spreading
- Traveled domestically, internationally, or been on a cruise ship
- Visited a public place with many people like a healthcare facility or a grocery store
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen7_2

records.Message__c:
You don’t require COVID-19 testing.
Based on your responses, there’s no evidence that you have symptoms of COVID-19. Stay healthy by practicing social distancing to reduce community transmission and follow guidance from your local officials.
records.Name: C19_No_Action

records.Message__c:
Do you have any of these symptoms?
- Extreme difficulty breathing
- Severe chest pain or pressure in your chest
- Face or lips turning blue
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen1

records.Message__c:
Do you have any of these additional symptoms?
- Muscle or body aches
- Persistent cough
- Sore throat
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen4

records.Message__c:
Do you have any of these symptoms?
- Severe, constant dizziness or lightheadedness
- Sudden confusion (new or worsening)
- Episodes of fainting or having trouble waking up
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen2

records.Message__c: In the last 14 days, have you done any of the following?
records.Name: C19_Symptom_Screen7

records.Message__c: Alert: You may be infected or have a risk for infection. Because you may be infected, please isolate yourself from others. Don’t go to public places, stay at home, and don’t have any visitors. Book an appointment immediately.
records.Name: C19_Symptomatic

records.Message__c: If your symptoms change or worsen, take this assessment again.
records.Name: C19_No_Action_2
